resources.string: I really appreciate your opinion about the app, please rate it. \n\nIf you experience problems when using the app or emerged ideas for its development, email me at the address tumolllaa@gmail.com

Currently supported formats 
video: mp4, 3gp, ts, webm, mkv, 
subtitles: srt, ass, ssa. 
In the future this list will expand. 
You really help developers if write a letter with their wishes formats to address tumolllaa@gmail.com
The video format is not supported
Are you sure you want to delete it from the list?
Change the file! Export it again?
